text: In Qur'onro ʙa haq nozil kardaem (ʙar Muhammad sallalloxu alajhi va sallam) va ʙa haq va sidq, adl va az taƣiru taʙdil nigoh dostasuda nozil sudaast va turo nafiristodem, magar on ki muƶda dihi ʙa cannat on kasero, ki farmonʙardori mekunad va ʙim dihi ʙa duzax on kasero, ki nofarmonʙardori va kufr mevarzad
